'''Drifting Luminescence''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] in [[Version 2.1]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2021-09-21 18:00:00 &ndash; 2021-10-12 14:59:59

===Summary===
* During this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Pearl of Wisdom" [[Sangonomiya Kokomi]] ({{Hydro}}) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* During this event wish, the 4-star characters "Thorny Benevolence" [[Rosaria]] ({{Cryo}}), "Uncrowned Lord of the Ocean" [[Beidou]] ({{Electro}}), and "Juvenile Galant" [[Xingqiu]] ({{Hydro}}) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish [[Wanderlust Invocation]].
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
